categories: Category:LEGO Star Wars: The Resistance Rises

nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: The Resistance Rises

LEGO Star Wars: The Resistance Rises was a series of animated shorts that aired on Disney XD From February 15, 2016 to May 4, 2016. The shorts were based around characters from the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens. Footage from the series has been repurposed as cutscenes for the LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens video game.
The series is available on the Disney streaming service Disney+.
